name: Club El Faraana Reef Resort
description: Located directly at the Cliff of Ras Um Sid, the Faraana Reef Resort overlooks the Red Sea. It includes a private beach, 3 swimming pools and a club. Diving and other water sports can be arranged upon request. All rooms and suites at the Faraana feature a balcony or terrace with a garden, pool or sea view. Each one includes a satellite TV, a minibar and a closet. The suite includes a spacious living room. Guests can feast on a selection of grilled dishes served at the Panorama and Grill Restaurant while enjoying the spectacular sea view. Cocktails, mocktails and light snacks are served at the 3 pool bars. After an energizing workout at the gym, guests can enjoy a game of tennis at the tennis court. For more relaxed options, a sauna and a hot tub are available at the spa for an additional fee. A variety of shops is available at the retail shopping mall on site. Naama Bay with its promenade and markets is a 5-minute drive away. A shuttle service is available to Naama Bay.
address: Hadabah Om El Sid,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Amphoras Aqua
description: With a stay at Amphoras Aqua in Sharm El Sheikh (El Hadaba), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Naama Bay and Naama Bay Beach. This beach resort is 7.9 mi (12.8 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre and 8.4 mi (13.6 km) from Shark's Bay. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers body treatments. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a waterslide, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this resort include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the complimentary area shuttle. All-inclusive rates are available at this resort. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Enjoy international cuisine at Blue Bar, one of the resort's many dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/cafe. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM. Featured amenities include limo/town car service, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 250 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private patios. Private bathrooms with showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: St UMM EL SID HILL, Al Fanar, Sharm Al Shiekh,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Palma di Sharm Hollywood Aqua Park Resort
description: With a stay at Palma Di Sharm Resort in Sharm El Sheikh, you'll be a 5-minute drive from Naama Bay and 8 minutes from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre. This hotel is 3.5 mi (5.6 km) from Shark's Bay and 4.5 mi (7.2 km) from Naama Bay Beach. Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless internet access and concierge services. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's many dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and 4 coffee shops/cafes. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 177 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and flat-screen televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include separate sitting areas and minibars, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: 15 Salam Street,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Seasun Hotel
description: Situated close to Dahab Canyon and Mount Sinai, Sea Sun Hotel offers a professional diving and water sports centre, dolphin-safari trips and excellent evening entertainment. Enjoy stylish and well-appointed rooms at Sun Sea Hotel, complete with stunning views of the sea and mountains from your private balcony. Keep in touch with friends and family with free wireless internet access. Explore the stunning Red Sea using Sea Sun’s unique Spi watercrafts. Join a professional guided tour or go diving at the beautiful Dahab Canyon. Take part in an exciting dolphin safari or one of Sea Sun’s organised boat trips. After a day of adventures in the water, Sea Sun Hotel offers plenty of ways for you to relax. Spend time in the sauna. Relax by the pool and enjoy a drink, whilst admiring the beautiful views of the Red Sea. Sample the delicious cuisine on offer at Sea Sun’s specialist restaurants, offering Asian and Italian delicacies. In the evening, dance the night away to 80s music, salsa or jazz at the lively Moonlight Bar.
address: GGX9+X22, Blue Hole Rd, Ø¹Ø³Ù„Ø©ØŒ Dahab,Dahab,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Le Mirage New Tower
description: Offering a fitness centre and a private beach area, Le Mirage New Tower is located in Sharm El Sheikh. WiFi access is available in public areas. The hotel is 4.9 km from Naama Bay. Each room here will provide you with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. Featuring a bath or shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer. You can enjoy sea view from the room. Extras include a seating area and satellite channels. Guests can enjoy all day dining at the restaurant. Other facilities offered at the property include entertainment staff, a nightclub and a shared lounge. The property offers free parking. Le Mirage New Tower is 13.8 km from Ras Mohammed National Park and 2.8 km from Il Mercato Mall. Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is 12 km away.
address: Om El Sid Cliff,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Dar Dahab
description: Located in Dahab, Dar Dahab is by the sea, a 1-minute drive from Asala Beach and 6 minutes from Dahab Beach. This beach aparthotel is 3.1 mi (4.9 km) from Dahab Lagoon and 3.9 mi (6.3 km) from Dahab Bay. Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and barbecue grills. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the aparthotel's room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Continental breakfasts are available daily for a fee. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Dahab? This aparthotel has 592 square feet (55 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 10 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and LCD televisions are provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: Dar Dahab, Assalah,St. Catherine,46617,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

Continental breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours). Make yourself comfortable in this individually decorated villa, featuring a kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven. A 100-cm flat-screen television with satellite programming provides entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include a separate sitting area and a microwave.

name: Red C Villas
description: Located in Dahab on the Red Sea Coast, Red C Villas and Apartments are situated between the Sinai Mountains and the sea. The property features a superb swimming pool with a children's section, and offers free WiFi in all areas. Centered around the swimming pool, the self-catered apartments feature a modern arabesque décor and are fitted with local stone and timber furnishings. Each fully air-conditioned apartment offers either balcony or garden with seating areas and views of the pool and mountains, and some come with stunning sea views. All have a kitchen complete with a fridge, stovetop and kettle. A washing machine is shared between all the apartments. The beach and local shops are a short walk away from from Red C Villas and Sharm El Sheikh International Airport is 60 minutes by car. Free public parking is possible at a location nearby.

name: Iberotel Redsina
description: In the vicinity of the hotel`s own beach lies the hotel Iberotel Redsina*****. There is a shuttle between the hotel and the airport (for a fee). On the beach are sun loungers and beach towels available. The hotel has a 24h reception (check-in is possible around the clock), a lobby bar, Wi-Fi, internet access, a supermarket, cash machine, a hairdresser, a jacuzzi, a first aid kit as well as parking spaces (limited). Outside there is a children's pool, where pool towels are available for free. Furthermore, you can relax outdoors on the terrace. For the young hotel guests there is a playground. For very young guests, kid`s chairs can also be provided. You can store your luggage in the hotel's storage room. There is also a laundry service available at an additional cost to customers. Ironing equipment can be rented at the hotel for a fee. For your comfort, in addition to the concierge service the hotel page will ensure you are looked after. If necessary, you can contact the medical centre at any time (for a fee). For conventions and other business meetings, the hotel offers EXTRA_FEE conference rooms. If you want to explore the holiday region, you can use the car rental service close to the hotel (extra fee). Euro/Master Card and Visa are accepted as means of payment. Due to its barrier-free facilities , such as barrier-free entrances and wheelchair accessible rooms, the hotel is also suitable for wheelchair users.
